content: <ns0:DIF xmlns:ns0="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/"          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"          xsi:schemaLocation="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/ http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/dif_v9.4.xsd">    <ns0:Entry_ID>bgs.nerc.ac.uk:DIF:BGS_CMD_REF314</ns0:Entry_ID>    <ns0:Entry_Title>Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) Geophysical Survey 2006/1_SEA8: Strategic Environmental Assessment Area 8: Inner Bristol Channel (29/Mar/2006 to 21/Apr/2006)</ns0:Entry_Title>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>NDGO0001</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>Geology</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>soil and sediment crust</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>Two-dimensional seismic reflection Side-scan sonar</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:ISO_Topic_Category>geoscientificInformation</ns0:ISO_Topic_Category>    <ns0:Keyword>NDGO0001</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>Geology</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>soil and sediment crust</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>Two-dimensional seismic reflection Side-scan sonar</ns0:Keyword>    <Source_Name xmlns="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/">       <Short_Name>NOTE! This GCMD DIF has been produced automatically from ISO19139 MEDIN v2.3 profile.  Not all MEDIN info is reproduced here - this conversion is intended to provide basic information to be reproduced in the NDG/MEDIN discovery service</Short_Name>    </Source_Name>    <ns0:Temporal_Coverage>       <ns0:Start_Date>2006-03-29</ns0:Start_Date>       <ns0:Stop_Date>2006-04-21</ns0:Stop_Date>    </ns0:Temporal_Coverage>    <ns0:Spatial_Coverage>       <ns0:Southernmost_Latitude>51.2249</ns0:Southernmost_Latitude>       <ns0:Northernmost_Latitude>51.3892</ns0:Northernmost_Latitude>       <ns0:Westernmost_Longitude>-3.4289</ns0:Westernmost_Longitude>       <ns0:Easternmost_Longitude>-3.0718</ns0:Easternmost_Longitude>    </ns0:Spatial_Coverage>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>British Geological Survey (BGS)</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>custodian</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>Department of Trade and Industry</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>originator</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>British Geological Survey (BGS)</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>distributor</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Summary>This geophysical and multibeam survey took place in March/April 2006 in the Bristol Channel on board the MV Confidante. It was carried out by Gardline under contract to British Geological Survey (BGS) and Geotek Ltd. It was co-funded by UK Department of Trade and Industry for their Strategic Environmental Assessment Programme and NERC/BGS for their marine mapping programme. The objective was to collect data for investigations of sediment mobility and for monitoring sea bed morphology and sea bed sediment texture. Seafloor bathymetry data were collected using an EM3000 multibeam system and Edgetech 4200FS sidescan sonar. Sub-bottom seismic profiling data were collected using a surface tow boomer. These data were recorded digitally and are archived by BGS. Technical details of the survey are contained in Gardline Report 6749, the BGS cruise report and preliminary geological interpretation are contained in BGS Report CR/06/085.</ns0:Summary>    <ns0:Related_URL>       <ns0:URL>http://www.bgs.ac.uk/GeoIndex/offshore.htm</ns0:URL>    </ns0:Related_URL>    <ns0:Metadata_Name>9.4</ns0:Metadata_Name>    <ns0:Metadata_Version>[CEOS IDN DIF]</ns0:Metadata_Version>    <ns0:DIF_Creation_Date>2006-04-21</ns0:DIF_Creation_Date> </ns0:DIF>
